title: Throwback to when Krepo helped a kid with leukemia get his biggest wish visiting the EULCS

embed.description: Donate to Min Stora Dag ("My Big Day") at its website: http://www.minstoradag.org ... A Swedish LCS fan with Leukemia travels to the Cologne studios to watch the weekly show, meet his favorite pro players and hang out with the casters behind the scenes. Our best wishes go to Martin and his family.

body: We might be the most toxic community in the world's number one online game but we still love you Riot Games.

replies.body:
Oh no, that's not a {{item:3070}} in my eye! I just got caught out by Pool Party Graves is all. 

It really brightens my day when I get to hear about how much League means to our players! I truly wouldn't be here on the boards with you all if I didn't care about helping you guys figure stuff out or help you get back on the Rift. We can't all be Krepo (be in on the Rift or IRL), but I hope I can do something this special for someone one day myself.

Thanks for bringing this back to our attention, it's good to look back on the good stuff from time to time!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Oh ma gad a reply from Riot Games team, You and everyone are awesome!
